item.title: Need Errant Bit
item.content:encoded:
I just want one, here are my items:

Food Pills: 2
Filtered Thread: 7
Filter Wrappings: 1
Dustpile: 1
Wasteland Rebreather: 1
Boring Bulb: 1
Powerful Potion: 1
Monochrome Pheromone: 1
Malted Pill: 1
Billy Bucket: 2

I'm also willing to give 4500 ryo for one.
